alert.note: Alert for Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 5:04AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Flagler County through 545 AM EDT... At 503 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Lake George, or near Pierson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Flagler County. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
